tool_description: Analyzes co-channel interference patterns between sites using the same frequency, calculating carrier-to-interference ratios and service quality impacts.

frequency_assignments.description: Site frequency assignments in site_id:frequency format

cir_threshold_db.description: Minimum acceptable carrier-to-interference ratio in dB

error_messages: Invalid frequency assignment format: Use site_id:frequency_mhz format.
No co-channel assignments found: At least 2 sites must share the same frequency.
Unsupported analysis method: Use statistical, deterministic, or monte-carlo methods.
Invalid CIR threshold: Threshold must be between 6-30 dB.
usage: Provide frequency assignments and analysis parameters to evaluate co-channel interference levels and quality impacts.

cir_matrix_db.description: Carrier-to-interference ratios for all co-channel pairs

degraded_areas_percent.description: Percentage of coverage area with CIR below threshold per site

worst_interferers.description: Site pairs causing highest interference levels
